name: IsoBoom
description: IsoBoom is a 2D isometric puzzle game about a small robot named SE01. The protagonist gets sent to a maze of puzzles as a punishment for theft. SE01 was promised forgiveness if he manages to beat the maze and escape.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win XP SP2+ Processor: Dual Core 1.5 Ghz+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
